name: Bartending Simulator 2023
description:
Have you ever wanted to mix drinks for rich college kids? Have you ever wanted to bust down to the club remix of Wonderwall? Have you ever wanted to overhear regrettable conversations?

This is Bartending Simulator 2023, the world's most advanced drink-mixing simulation experience of the year. 

Controls/Gameplay

- Click and Drag an Ingredient above the cup to add some precious drops of liquid to your cup.

- Mix-and-match your favorite flavors together to produce an exciting concoction for your customers. 

- If something goes awry, click the Pour Out button to discard your drink.

Credits:

Audio Medic/Designer/Producer/Programmer/Artist/Drink Namer: Adam Grisdale

Programming Assistant/Drink Namer: Reid Harry

Art Assistant: Ian Kercorian, Rachel Flatley

Voice Actors: Adam Grisdale, Reid Harry, Ian Kercorian, Drew White, Zoe Naylor

Wonderwall Artist: Oasis

Wonderwall Club Remixer: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aKmGWWxxncs

Glug Glug Glug SFX: https://freesound.org/people/hanstimm/sounds/256861/
